title: Vishal
blurb: TUI + Web dashboard for pipelines & workers. Observe jobs, nodes, artifacts, and throughput in real-time.
description: Vishal is a visual shell that gives operators situational awareness across batch pipelines. It consumes compact JSON/NDJSON event streams from runners like Vikram (and custom adapters) to render queue depth, worker health, job lifecycle, retries, latency distributions, and artifact timelines. It ships with a terminal UI for low-friction server sessions and an optional web UI for wallboards.

versions.notes: Web UI panel, event adapters, role-checked actions.
Initial TUI with queues, workers, and job tables.
